title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 704.4 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 704.4 - Definitions

State Regulations

Whenever used in this Part: (a) State oversight agency shall have the
same meaning as expressed in subdivision (4-a) of section
488
of the

Social Services Law. (b) Facility
or provider agency shall have the same meaning as expressed in subdivision (4)
of section
488
of the

Social Services Law. (c) Vulnerable
person shall have the same meaning as expressed in subdivision (15) of section
488
of the

Social Services Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
704.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
